newsitem.title: USA: HCIA sees Q3 charge from merger.
newsitem.headline: HCIA sees Q3 charge from merger.

text.p: HCIA Inc said on Monday its third quarter earnings are expected to be in the range of $0.10 to $0.15 per share, prior to a $41.2 million charge retaled to an acquisition.
The charge stems from writing off in-process research and development from LBA Health Care Management Inc, which the company acquired in August 1996, HCIA said.
The company said it did not meet its revenue goals for the quarter.
HCIA posted earnings per share of $0.19 a year ago in the third quarter and $0.18 in the fourth quarter.
Analysts had expected HCIA to post earnings per share of $0.29 in both the third and fourth quarters.
In the fourth quarter, the company expects to report earnings per share in the $0.15 to $0.20 range.
